full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 378 Filed 10/27/21 Page 1 of 2 UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT SOUTHERN DISTRICT OF NEW YORK UNITED STATES OF AMERICA, v. GHISLAINE MAXWELL, Defendant. S2 20 Cr. 330 (AJN) NOTICE OF MOTION GHISLAINE MAXWELL'S MOTION UNDER FEDERAL RULE OF EVIDENCE 412 TO PERMIT QUESTIONING ABOUT HER ACCUSERS' SEXUAL BEHAVIOR PLEASE TAKE NOTICE that, upon the accompanying memorandum of law, Defendant Ghislaine Maxwell, through counsel, hereby moves under Federal Rule of Evidence 412 and the constitutional rights to present a defense and to confrontation to permit questioning regarding her accusers' other sexual behavior. Dated: October 27, 2021 New York, New York DOJ-OGR-00005390

text_blocks.content: UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT SOUTHERN DISTRICT OF NEW YORK
UNITED STATES OF AMERICA, v. GHISLAINE MAXWELL, Defendant.
GHISLAINE MAXWELL'S MOTION UNDER FEDERAL RULE OF EVIDENCE 412 TO PERMIT QUESTIONING ABOUT HER ACCUSERS' SEXUAL BEHAVIOR

PLEASE TAKE NOTICE that, upon the accompanying memorandum of law, Defendant Ghislaine Maxwell, through counsel, hereby moves under Federal Rule of Evidence 412 and the constitutional rights to present a defense and to confrontation to permit questioning regarding her accusers' other sexual behavior.
Dated: October 27, 2021 New York, New York

additional_notes: The document appears to be a formal court filing with no visible redactions or damage.
